title: Can't Connect But My Internet Is Fine.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Not sure what's going on but when I finished an aram i got a pop that said there's a problem with my connection, and it asked me to reset my client or shut it down. I reset my client and got the same pop up. I shut it down and still got that. I reset my computer and internet and still nothing. Also I cant sign into the riot support pages. Any help would be appreciated. Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, there were server issues overnight for a few regions.  Everything looks okay now, and you should be able to login!
Yep same problem, i was finally able to log on but i cannot click on the play button..... Great riot, apply all these new changes but never fix the problems with the game.

Same.
I recall this happening a few weeks ago where a number of players couldn't connect to League even though their internet was fine. I was one of them. I remember reading a red post saying there was an issue where the ISP couldn't connect to Riot servers or some shit. I don't know, I just went to sleep, woke up the next day & the issue seem to have been resolved. 
I don't know if it's the same issue now, but if it is, eh give it a couple of hours or something.

> [{quoted}](name=Jeddy017,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=sbjgzdI1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-23T04:47:13.941+0000)
>
> Same.
> I recall this happening a few weeks ago where a number of players couldn't connect to League even though their internet was fine. I was one of them. I remember reading a red post saying there was an issue where the ISP couldn't connect to Riot servers or some shit. I don't know, I just went to sleep, woke up the next day & the issue seem to have been resolved. 
> I don't know if it's the same issue now, but if it is, eh give it a couple of hours or something.

mmk thank you. Wonder what happened though. It can't be the new client right?
It's not worth much, but I'm in the same position you are.  Around the same time also.  If there are others, then it might be something on Riots side.

> [{quoted}](name=xI Kirito lx,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=sbjgzdI1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-23T04:31:24.000+0000)

its good to know its not just me. thanks.
